text: "You Stole the Sun from My Heart" is a 1999 song by Welsh rock band Manic Street Preachers and is the third single from their fifth studio album This Is My Truth Tell Me Yours. It went to number 2 in Iceland, number 5 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 20 in Ireland, number 94 in the Netherlands and number 97 in Australia. The song was later namechecked in the 2007 song Your Love Alone Is Not Enough. ==Track listings== All music was written by James Dean Bradfield and Sean Moore except where indicated. All lyrics were written by Nick Jones except where indicated.
